title: General
stimulusHtml:
3 points maximum (1 point each)

  • Calculate available energy in ATP: 219 kcal

  • Calculate efficiency: 0.31 - 0.32 or 31 - 32%

  • Describe fate of excess energy: Released as heat/increases entropy
descriptions:

  • Calculate available energy in ATP: 219 kcal

  • Describe fate of excess energy: Released as heat/increases entropy
